entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:16 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 3:19 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -43.6°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 46.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 46. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 62 in the morning and minus 55 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
